channel.title: [PI] runserver error wtf?
channel.description:
Ummm, dunno what is this error, cuz I haven't edited anything except clickitem and object handler.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:362) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:60) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: [PI] runserver error wtf?
item.dc:creator: @lollazer lollazer
item.description:
@lollazer wrote:

Woopsies, my bad. Didn’t even notice. There was one space instead of tab in item.cfg . Lol @my stupidness…

Read full topic
